Start.text: The smell of gun-smoke and blood merge as you open your eyes and find yourself in what appears to be a massive crumbling manor. Shattered windows, upended furniture and browned blood stains appear to be the new design motif. You hear gunshots in the distance and a chorus of guttural growls - growls that almost sounded human.

Hall.message: A voice cracks over the radio 'HELLO! HELLO! IS ANYONE STILL IN THERE? YOU NEED TO GET OUT, NOW! IT'S LOOSE IN THE MANOR, TOTALLYNOTNEMESIS WAS RELEASED BY THE RAINCOAT CORP. IT'S A NEW ROUND OF TESTING ON HUMAN SUBJECTS. I KNOW THERE'S AT LEAST A SHOTGUN, SHELLS, AND MAYBE THE MAKINGS OF A MOLOTOV COCKTAIL. THE INFIRMARY SHOULD HAVE ADRENALINE. YOU'RE GOING TO NEED IT. GET A WEAPON AND THE ADRENALINE AND GET THE HELL OUT OF THERE!' The message ends.
Hall.text: You look around the hallway you're in, a broken chandelier and shattered glass decorate the marble floor. You see a walkie talkie sitting on a side table. You can continue north or south.

Infirmary.text: You enter the infirmary. Supplies have been completely wiped from the shelves. The once white sheets were stained and shredded. As you shift through the remnants of supplies, mostly cotton balls and tongue compressors, you find a roll of cotton bandages. Behind a counter you find a box, tucked away, almost as it was hidden. Inside is the adrenaline. What would you like to do? You can continue west, north, or south.

Kitchen.text: More bare shelves in the kitchen. A few cans adorn the shelves, past expiration - even for canned goods. On the table, half a bottle of high-proof rum, covered in dust. What would you like to do? You can move north, east, or south.

Basement.text: You take a deep breath as you open the door to the basement. The air is cool and damp. Sound exists in a vacuum. You hear nothing. A basement devoid of the sounds of rodents. You quickly survey the basement in the dark. You spot a rusted shotgun leaned against a support beam. What would you like to do? You can move north

Library.text: You enter what appears to be a once massive library. Volumes lie tattered on faded and stained intricate rugs. A leather sofa is torn, the sofa filling pouring out, stained with deep brown stains. Old blood. You survey the room, On one of the shelves a white cardboard box is tucked behind a massive tome. Shotgun shells. On the desk, a Zippo lighter. What would you like to do? You can move east, or south.

Lab.text: Something recently happened here. You feel an electricity pulsing through the lab. Your heart rate begins to increase. Tubing, and IV cables lie on the ground. An observation window is shattered. Shards of glass crunch underfoot. What would you like to do? You can move west or south.
